subject: Football (College)
Bowl Games
lead_paragraph: The Spartans scored with 17 seconds left to cap a three-touchdown, fourth-quarter comeback in a 42-41 victory over Baylor, which was snubbed for a playoff spot.
snippet: The Spartans scored with 17 seconds left to cap a three-touchdown, fourth-quarter comeback in a 42-41 victory over Baylor, which was snubbed for a playoff spot.
